# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(algorithm LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(algorithm "")
set_target_properties(algorithm PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "algorithm")
set_target_properties(algorithm PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(algorithm PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_options(algorithm PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET algorithm PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(algorithm PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(algorithm PRIVATE
    main.cpp
    src/CStyle/List.cpp
    src/CStyle/Queue.cpp
    src/CStyle/Stack.cpp
    src/CStyle/Util.cpp
    src/Divide_and_Conquer.cpp
    src/Sort.cpp
    include/CStyle/List.h
    include/CStyle/Queue.h
    include/CStyle/Stack.h
    include/CStyle/Util.h
    include/Divide_and_Conquer.h
    include/Sort.h
)
